Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.common.deliverable

Class Response

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.common.deliverable.Deliverable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.network.common.deliverable.Response
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Response
extends Deliverable
    Response-type Deliverables are the only ones sent by the client to the Server, and carry with them an integer equivalent to the end user's choice.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
